fields.name: Amazon Japan
fields.description: Japan has a population of 127 million people*1 and has the 3rd largest economy size in the world*2, and selling your products on Amazon.co.jp will give you access to millions of customers in Japan.

fields.name: Kaola
fields.description: Kaola has 6m members but is part of Netease with 688m customers. Focus on baby, health and beauty, food/nutrition, clothes, home and digital.

fields.name: Flipkart
fields.description: Flipkart is India's largest online retailer with 51% market share, and 75 million registered users.
